title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: London Became a Global Hub for Phone Theft. Now We Know Why.
items.description: About 80,000 phones were stolen in the British capital last year. The police are finally discovering where many of them went.

items.title: What Are Tomahawk Missiles, and Why Might Trump Give Them to Ukraine?
